attr.title: Beatblock
attr.desc: SPIN TO WIN: Move your paddle around to hit blocks to the beat! Taps and different block types- like mines and sides- keep things fresh.
attr.inst: Download the Linux version of the game from https://bubbletabby.itch.io/beatblock and extract its .zip after that copy the Beatblock file from the bin/ directory into the beatblock/gamedata/ directory on your device
